newsitem.title: USA: Greyhound Lines Aug passenger sales rise.
newsitem.headline: Greyhound Lines Aug passenger sales rise.

text.p: 1) All statistics are unaudited, in thousands, unless otherwise noted and are for Greyhound Lines Inc., only. These statistics do not include the company's bus operating subsidiaries. The traffic information for 1995 differs slightly from information previously reported due to continued refinements in the company's data analysis systems.

2) These statistics are for sales generated by 198 of the company's largest locations which electronically report sales. The same locations are used for 1995 and 1996 and represent approximately 73 percent of total monthly ticket sales. The company's smaller locations have not shown the same rate of growth in sales and passenger counts. It is necessary to adjust the sales totals for refunds, unredeemed tickets, interline activity and other miscellaneous items to reflect revenues and related statistics for financial statement purposes.
3) Includes all Greyhound Lines Inc locations. Does not include bus operating subsidiaries.
